rules.name: AddOffer
rules.conditionLogic: 7 AND ( 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 )
rules.label: AddOffer

rules.name: Add_Counter
rules.conditionLogic: 7 AND 8 AND ( 1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 )
rules.label: Add Counter

Flow.description: adding sale opp to offer updates

formulas.name: AddAgreeBTNClick
formulas.expression: AND( OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!OfferCreatebtn.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddOppBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddOppBrokerBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed" ), OR( NOT(ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Buying_Broker__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Purchase_Opportunity__c})) ) )

formulas.name: AddAgreedBTNErrorlick
formulas.expression: AND( OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!OfferCreatebtn.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddOppBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddOppBrokerBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Agreed" ), AND( ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Buying_Broker__c}), ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Purchase_Opportunity__c}) ) )

formulas.name: AddBrokerBtnClick
formulas.expression: OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Broker", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Broker", {!OfferCreatebtn.outputValue} = "Add Broker", {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Broker", {!AddOppBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Broker", {!AddOppBrokerBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Broker", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Broker" )

formulas.name: AddCounterBtnClick
formulas.expression: OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Counter", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Counter", {!OfferCreatebtn.outputValue} = "Add Counter", {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Counter", {!AddOppBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Counter", {!AddOppBrokerBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Counter", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Counter" )

formulas.name: AddCounterPrice
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!AddCounter.fieldValuesJson}, "Counter"), VALUE( SUBSTITUTE( LEFT( MID( {!AddCounter.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("Counter", {!AddCounter.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("Counter") + 3, 100 ), FIND( '"', MID( {!AddCounter.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("Counter", {!AddCounter.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("Counter") + 3, 100 ) ) - 1 ), ",", "" ) ), NULL )

formulas.name: AddOfferButtonClick
formulas.expression: OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Offer", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Offer", {!OfferCreatebtn.outputValue} = "Add Offer", {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Offer", {!AddOppBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Offer", {!AddOppBrokerBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Offer", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Offer" )

formulas.name: AgreePriceValue
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!AddAgreed.fieldValuesJson}, "Agreed"), VALUE( SUBSTITUTE( LEFT( MID( {!AddAgreed.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("Agreed", {!AddAgreed.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("Agreed") + 3, 100 ), FIND( '"', MID( {!AddAgreed.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("Agreed", {!AddAgreed.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("Agreed") + 3, 100 ) ) - 1 ), ",", "" ) ), NULL )

formulas.name: ClickAddBrokerPurchase
formulas.expression: OR( {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase", {!OfferCreatebtn.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase", {!OfferUpdateHeaderControll.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase", {!AddOppBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase", {!AddOppBrokerBtnController.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase", {!AddBrokerController.outputValue} = "Add Broker Purchase" )

formulas.name: OfferPriceCreate
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!PopUpScreenOfferCreate.fieldValuesJson}, "offerPrice"), VALUE( SUBSTITUTE( LEFT( MID( {!PopUpScreenOfferCreate.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("offerPrice", {!PopUpScreenOfferCreate.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("offerPrice") + 3, 100 ), FIND( '"', MID( {!PopUpScreenOfferCreate.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("offerPrice", {!PopUpScreenOfferCreate.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("offerPrice") + 3, 100 ) ) - 1 ), ",", "" ) ), NULL )

formulas.name: PriceAddoffer
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!PopUpScreenOfferAddOffer.fieldValuesJson}, "Price"), VALUE( SUBSTITUTE( LEFT( MID( {!PopUpScreenOfferAddOffer.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("Price", {!PopUpScreenOfferAddOffer.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("Price") + 3, 100 ), FIND( '"', MID( {!PopUpScreenOfferAddOffer.fieldValuesJson}, FIND("Price", {!PopUpScreenOfferAddOffer.fieldValuesJson}) + LEN("Price") + 3, 100 ) ) - 1 ), ",", "" ) ), NULL )

formulas.name: ValueInMessage
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Buying_Broker__c}) && ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Purchase_Opportunity__c}), "Buying Broker, Purchase Opportunity", IF( ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Buying_Broker__c}), "Buying Broker", IF( ISBLANK({!SaleOfferDataTable.firstSelectedRow.Purchase_Opportunity__c}), "Purchase Opportunity", "" ) ) )

Flow.label: BrokerSaleSubflowOffer
